amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes technical and conforming changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 128 the text of the amendment is printed in House Report 112-20.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 422 - 0 (Roll no. 158).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 422 - 0 (Roll no. 158).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Mica.
